snippet.title: Arcade Classics - Philips CD-i Gameplay
snippet.description:
Compilations of Namco arcade games are nothing new, especially when you consider their popular Namco Museum series. But out of all the pre-Museum compilations, Arcade Classics for the Philips CD-i comes out as a pretty weird one. The game contains Galaxian, Ms. Pac-Man and Galaga... though Galaga has major emulation issues when running on the Same CD-i core on RetroArch.

Galaga, Galaxian(C) BANDAI NAMCO Entertainment Inc.
Ms. Pac-Man (C) AtGames
Arcade Classics (CD-i) (C) Philips Media

#retrogaming #retrogames #galaga #mspacman #galaxian #namco #philips #philipscdi #cdi #philipscdigames #arcadeclassics #arcadeclassicscdi
